item.description:
Join us for a fun night of swing dancing with Swing City Boston. Swing City meets at the Cambridge Youth Center. Swing dancing lesson starts at 8pm. Lesson concludes at 9pm and a live swing band performs until midnight while we swing dance the night away! All levels are welcome. The group divides into beginner lesson and intermediate/advanced lesson.

The band will be:

The Love Dogs

Voted 2006 "Outstanding New England Band", plus Ed Scheer voted "Most Charismatic Entertainer"

Admission is $16, cash only. Group discounts may be available, I am checking with the venue and will update if we can get a discount. According to the website, there is lots of free parking nearby!

For more info on Swing City, check out their website:

http://swingcityboston.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a fun night of swing dancing with Swing City Boston
item.name: Swing Dancing Lesson and Night of Dancing, Cambridge
